content: there s some bunny in the hood i hope you like living in your hoodies as much as i do adding to my amigurumi bunny family meet this new little cutie who is the newest free pattern on the blog growing up hoodies are my daily uniform heck what am i talking about hoodies are still a part of my daily wardrobe this adorable bunny wearing a hoodie is one of my most popular crochet patterns ever designed fun fact did you know that in saskatchewan canada hoodies are referred to as bunny hugs i ve made this amigurumi bunny using worsted-weight yarn as well as chunky yarn for a cuddle-size amigurumi this pattern is suitable for beginners who are learning to crochet but make sure you know how to crochet a sphere sewing is required to piece it together
